authors: Michael Nekrasov. Based on DnD 5e by John Myles
instructions: This is an extension for the DnD 5e sheet by John Myles that imlements Kingdom Building rules. It is designed to be modular so can be easily inserted into other character sheet systems. For event rolling to work from the sheet it requires a table named Town-Event. You can manually build this table or use the import script populate_event_table.js.
